title: "Commercial contracts"

Our experienced lawyers provide the right guidance and relevant documents for every business need. We also partner with our clients to assist in negotiating contracts with third parties to ensure risk coverage.

We understand the importance of contracts to protect the rights and obligations of our clients while doing business with third parties. Our experienced lawyers provide the right guidance and relevant documents for every business need. We also partner with our clients to assist in negotiating contracts with third parties to ensure risk coverage. Below are some of the areas we cover through our services which are based on specific customer requirements.

  - Draft all kinds of commercial agreements, SOPs, internal policies, guidelines etc.
  - We guide business with the right documents for a particular business transaction. 
  - Draft standardised contract templates. Our drafts are practical and easy to execute.
  - Analyse executed contracts to highlight risks and deviation from standard practises.
  - Assist in renegotiating terms of existing contracts on behalf of our clients with third parties in order to protect their interest. 
  - Collaborate with in-house counsels to work on contentious clauses and find workable solutions in their interest.  
  - Provide Tender bidding advisory and strategy.
  - Provide training on contract drafting and negotiations strategy
